"P/N: 141752C20001J REV: 01" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Arcadyan]] ARV7529PW (ARV7529PW-B-LF-lR)
*[https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/arv752dpw On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] (ARV752DPW) *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=147290 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] ([https://skydrive.live.com/?cid=9bab4da2644c3fa5&id=9BAB4DA2644C3FA5%21240&sff=1 internal images] x)
===See also=== *[[Vodafone DSL-EasyBox 602]] - [[Arcadyan]] ARV7529PW *[[Vodafone DSL-EasyBox 802]] - [[Arcadyan]] [https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/arv752dpw ARV752DPW] *[[Vodafone DSL-EasyBox 803]](A) - [[Arcadyan]] [https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/astoria/arv752dpw22 ARV752DPW22] *[[Vodafone DSL-EasyBox 903]] - [[Arcadyan]] [https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/vrv752dhw22 VRV752DHW22] :SoC: [[Infineon]] ([[Lantiq]]) ''VINAX'' @333MHz (Dual core) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX29GL128EL (16MB NOR) :RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM68B16CWQD-25H (64MB DDR2) :WLAN: [[Ralink]] RT3062F (802.11bgn 2T2R WiSoC) :ADSL: [[Infineon]] ([[Lantiq]]) ''XWAY VRX208'' (ADSL2+) :ETH: [[Lantiq]] PSB 6970 V; 4x FE (100Mbps) ports :VoIP: [[Lantiq]] PEF 42068 V V1.2 (''XWAY SLIC120''), 3x FXS
